notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Project design and coordination was performed by S.A. and K.M. Samples were collected by and selected by P.B., K.M. and J.D. with clinical data collection coordinated by P.B. Nucleic acid was extracted by Y.Y., L.C. and A.C. Initial HPeV testing were performed by J.D., Y.Y. and L.C. A.C. performed the sample library and NGS DNA sequencing and Sanger sequencing. A.C. wrote initial manuscript with input from S.A. and later versions were based on input and suggestions from all.
